title: [Cartwright, Reception]
description: Painted crates, repurposed with quilted cushions, provide seating against a pine-paneled wall.  Fully parted drab linen curtains adorn a wide-framed window, tied back to allow soft moonlight to bathe the room.

Painted crates, repurposed with quilted cushions, provide seating against a pine-paneled wall.  Slightly parted drab linen curtains adorn a wide-framed window, somewhat shielding the room from the sun's harsh light.
